info.title: Cubicle Shooter City
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Cubicle Shooter City is a top down shooter with a procedurally generated city and a bonus mode that features procedural destruction of the aforementioned city.

Controls:
Analog stick = Move
IR pointer = Aim
B button = Shoot

Author:
ThatOtherPerson (thatotherperson@yahoo.com)
ThatOtherDev.com
